word_mean_info__list.difference: 指触犯刑律的人被关押的地方，通常指判决后的罪犯居留地。
指单人牢房或几个人合住的小牢房。
(英国英语拼写为gaol)指收犯轻罪的人或未经判决的人的处所。

监狱医务人员；监狱医生；狱医

bilingual.source: It's only fair that both criminals go to prison.
bilingual.target: 两个罪犯都进监狱是公平的。

bilingual.source: The man was found guilty and sent to prison for two years.
bilingual.target: 这个人被判有罪并被送进监狱两年。

bilingual.source: The warden oversees all the operations within the prison.
bilingual.target: 监狱长负责监狱内的所有运作。

bilingual.source: The prison was built based on the panopticon model.
bilingual.target: 这座监狱是基于全景监狱模型建造的。
监狱里的生活非常艰苦。
他们参观了当地的监狱。

bilingual.source: A riot broke out in the prison.
bilingual.target: 监狱里暴发了一场骚乱。

list.abstract: prison，英文单词，意思是监狱; 监禁; 入狱; 牢笼。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my phone. "s.o.s. still in prison."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的电话。"救命，我还在监狱里。"

yingyinNormal.en: Hanna has been in prison for over 20 years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 汉娜已经在监狱里生活了20多年。

yingyinNormal.en: Take me? Take me where? Not Azkaban prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 带我走？去哪儿？不会是阿兹卡班监狱吧？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Apparently, whatever they're looking for is in the Ojal prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然，他们要找的东西在欧哈监狱。

yingyinNormal.en: Impersonating a federal employee? Where's the after-party, prison?
yingyinNormal.zh: 冒充联邦雇员吗？你们的庆功宴在哪举办，监狱吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Drink up. Wait. Prison guard. Were you a prison guard before? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喝了吧，等等，监狱守卫你以前做过监狱守卫吗? 没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, it was a haunted pr... It was a haunted prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那是个闹鬼的...那是个闹鬼的监狱。

yingyinNormal.en: And send my husband back to prison? This time for murder?
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我丈夫重新进监狱吗？这次可是谋杀唉。

yingyinNormal.en: You took them? They're the key. They're gonna help us take that prison without firing a shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你带回了他们？他们是进监狱的钥匙，他们会帮我们，不费一枪一弹夺取那座监狱。

yingyinNormal.en: And just beyond the lake, there was a prison. This isn't scary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在湖那边，有一个监狱。一点都不吓人啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Where is Morris now? In prison, serving 15 years for manslaughter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫里斯现在在哪儿？监狱里，过失杀人判了十五年。

yingyinNormal.en: I was scouting the prison and our paths crossed, so I took 'em.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当时在侦查监狱碰上了他们，所以我把他们带回来了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're not gonna put me in a prison. You're not gonna put any of us in a prison. You know why? Do enlighten us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们不会把我关进监狱，不会把我们中任何一个人关进去。知道为什么？请你提示一下吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, of course I chose that. I mean, I couldn't work in prison, and, uh…
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然我选择了后者。我的意思是，我，不能在监狱里工作，呃……

yingyinNormal.en: So, what does the other guy do? Does he go to college too? No, he's in prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，另一个人是干什么的？他也上大学了吗？不，他在蹲监狱。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, it's 20 feet up in the air, and it's in the middle of the most heavily-guarded part of the prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那里高达20尺，又是监狱戒备最森严的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Your husband is wasting away in prison and you're trying to seduce your way into a job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的丈夫在监狱里日渐消瘦，你却想靠勾引别人来获得工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the judge gave me a choice, either two years in prison or hormonal therapy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，法官给我一个选择，呃，要么在监狱坐两年牢，要么激素治疗。

yingyinNormal.en: He's put a total of seven people in prison, all of them aggressors who had harmed his patients.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他已经送了七个人进监狱，全都是伤害过他病人的凶手。

yingyinNormal.en: Priority call from Secretary Ross. There's been a breach at the Raft Prison. Yeah, put him through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国务卿罗斯的优先来电，孤岛监狱遭人劫狱。嗯，接过来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Soon after his father's release from <highlight>prison</highlight>, Dickens got a better job as errand boy in law offices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父亲出狱后不久，狄更斯找到了一份更好的工作，在律师事务所当跑腿的。

examination_example.sentence: Using a fashion model that does not meet a government-defined index of body mass could result in a $85, 000 fine and six months in <highlight>prison</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用不符合政府规定的身体质量指数的时装模特，可能会被处以8.5万美元的罚款和长达6个月的监禁。

examination_example.sentence: A judge might be to send someone to <highlight>prison</highlight> if he had already sentenced five or six defendants only to forced community service on that day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果法官他在那天只判了五六个被告强制社区服务，可能会把一个人送进监狱。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 囚犯；拘留犯；羁押犯；战俘；俘虏；遭非法囚禁者；失去自由的人；陷入困境之人

examination_example.sentence: Campaigners point out that a high percentage of the <highlight>prison</highlight> population is left-handed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 活动人士指出，监狱中左撇子的比例很高。

examination_example.sentence: "I'm, like, in <highlight>prison</highlight> for weekdays. That's what we call it in the workplace," says a woman in her 20s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位20多岁的女性说：“工作日我就像在坐牢。在工作场所我们就是这样称呼这座城市的。”

examination_example.sentence: She has to make the <highlight>prison</highlight> break in her own car.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她得开着自己的车越狱。

word_usage.usage:
①表示“监禁"肘，prison前不加冠词：in prison坐牢，put sb. in prison将某人投进监狱。
②表示“监狱”的建筑时，prison前常加冠词：go to the prison to visit him去监狱探望他。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的简单行为把Parks送进了监狱。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>prison</highlight> is no place in which to sing.
The <highlight>prison</highlight> was dark, with bars all round it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 监狱里一片漆黑，四周都是栅栏。
